hackathon-description-text: MangoHacks is a chance to meet new people, learn something, make something, dream along, and have fun.
hackathon-eligibility:
Any one from any University/College is eligible to participate. 
 
Team size:4 or less
hackathon-rules:
TL;DR. Be repectful. Harassment and abuse are never tolerated. If you are in a situation that makes you uncomfortable at an officially sanctioned MLH event, if the event itself is creating an unsafe or inappropriate environment, or if interacting with a MLH representative or event organizer makes you uncomfortable, please report it using the procedures included in 
 document.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: JP Morgan Chase-Best Hack for Empowering Minority Entrepreneurs
Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS
